description: This course introduces students to teaching Latin in grades K-12. Theories, methods, issues, and trends are examined. Other topics include curriculum development and textbook, computer and audio visual resources. Offered upon demand. Arranged with Classics and Education chairs and the Latin instructor. Prerequisite: Education 330 or permission of instructor. Spring Semester only.
name: Teaching of Latin, K-12
prerequisites: Education 330 or permission of instructor. Spring Semester only.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Education 330 or permission of instructor. Spring Semester only.
